name: roytang
text:
First 30 minutes of Sony at #E3: "The conference is about to start in a few minutes!"

[09:04] Sony #e3 conf opening with an extravagant orchestra. This is a waste of time!

[09:42] $399 PSVR @_@

[09:48] FF15 has VR! #PlaystationE3

[09:49] my problem with VR in general is that I'm not really a first-person kind of guy #PlayStationE3

[10:08] I do not dig white-logo Spider-man #PlayStationE3

[10:11] My moonshot hope for #PlayStationE3 is backwards compatibility with all PS platforms via software emu. Not gonna happen though

[10:19] Just game after game for #PlayStationE3 Nothing too exciting for me, but I appreciate the format

[10:20] Also, no Vita love @PlayStation? Not even a little? D: #PlayStationE3
